title: OBDeleven VAG car diagnostics
description:
OBDeleven is a go-to scan tool for every driver, seamlessly turning your smartphone into a powerful car reader. It simplifies diagnosing, customizing, and enhancing your vehicle, and saves time and money in the long run. Endorsed by industry giants like the Volkswagen Group, BMW Group, and Toyota Group, OBDeleven is trusted by drivers and enthusiasts alike for accessible, comprehensive car care. 

The OBDeleven VAG app, together with the OBDeleven NextGen or FirstGen device, is designed exclusively for Volkswagen Group (VAG) vehicle owners. It’s the third-party tool approved by Volkswagen Group to access SFD-locked features. 

KEY FEATURES  

- Advanced Diagnostics: Know all about your car’s health. Scan all control units in minutes. Easily diagnose, clear, and share fault codes. Monitor real-time vehicle performance. It’s like having a professional mechanic at your fingertips, so your car keeps running at its best, always.  

- One-Click Apps: Customize your car’s features with a single click. Our ready-to-use applications – One-Click Apps – let you activate, turn off, and adjust car’s functions fast and easy. It’s your go-to toolbox of specialized tweaks to make your car uniquely yours.  

- Professional Features: Take car diagnostics and customization to the next level with coding and adaptations designed for the experienced car lovers and workshops. Fine-tune and modify your car’s systems with precision and control that every car enthusiast demands, but without the bulky equipment. 

Find a detailed feature list here: https://obdeleven.com/features  

PLANS 

OBDeleven works on a subscription-based model with three plans for drivers of different skill levels and needs.  

FREE Plan is best suited for beginners and daily drivers and comes with every device at no cost. Features include: 

- Advanced Diagnostics (full scan, reading & clearing faults, live data monitoring) 
- Vehicle Information (VIN, year, mileage, equipment) 
- One-Click Apps (in-app purchase required) 

PRO VAG Plan is for real car enthusiasts who want to dive deeper into their vehicles. Features include: 

- Advanced Diagnostics (full scan, reading & clearing faults, live data monitoring, charts, battery status) 
- Vehicle Access (history, vehicle information, vehicle backup) 
- Professional Features (coding & long coding, adaptations & long adaptations) 
- One-Click Apps (in-app purchase required) 

ULTIMATE VAG Plan is for the most experienced car lovers and workshops. Features include: 

- Unlimited, free One-Click Apps 
- Advanced Diagnostics
- Vehicle Access (history, vehicle information, vehicle backup) 
- Professional Features (coding & long coding, adaptations & long adaptations) 
- OCAbuilder (building One-Click Apps yourself) 
- RAW data  

View plans here: https://obdeleven.com/plans 

GETTING STARTED 

1. Plug the OBDeleven device into your car's OBD2 port 
2. Create an account on the OBDeleven VAG app 
3. Pair the device with your app. Enjoy!  

SUPPORTED VEHICLES 

Volkswagen, Audi, Škoda, Cupra, Seat, Bentley, and Lamborghini. Full list of supported models: https://obdeleven.com/supported-vehicles 

COMPATIBILITY 

Works with the OBDeleven FirstGen and the OBDeleven NextGen devices and Android 8.0 or later. 

LEARN MORE 

- Website: https://obdeleven.com/ 
- Support & FAQ: https://support.obdeleven.com 
- Community Forum: https://forum.obdeleven.com/ 

Download the OBDeleven VAG app and enjoy a better driving experience now.

summary: Innovative software for vehicle diagnostics and customizations
